topSection.subtitle: A Developer/Consultant based in China.
topSection.paragraph: Have 7 years of software development experience. While focusing more on frontend, also have practical experience in backend development, architecture design and DevOps. Experienced in E2E products from idea to release. Have deep understanding of Agile development, with rich experience of leading Agile team. A motivated, resonsible, team-oriented fast learner with strong can-do attitude.
topSection.resume: Browse my resume to know more about me

companies.name: Thoughtworks
companies.titles: Senior Consultant / Senior UI Dev / Tech Lead
companies.summary: Delivered several cross-region projects in Agile way with high quality. Played as the lead role in the delivery team, contributing on both technical and business sides with clients. Also served as the member of department core team and office frontend community core team.
